title: SAMSUNG 163 cm (65 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart TV with Voice Search  (UA65TUE60AKXXL)

product_specification.In The Box: 1N LED TV , 1N POWER CORD, 2N BATTERY-ALKALINE(AA Size),1N REMOCON,1N STAND-LEFT, 1N STAND-RIGHT
product_specification.Supported App - Others: SonyLiv, Eros Now, Jio Cinema, Gaana, Youtube, Facebook, Spotify, India Today, Aaj Tak, Sun Next, Big Flix
product_specification.Other Remote Control Features: One Remote Control for all functions
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: Voice Assistants, PC Mode, Music System, Home Cloud, Live Cast, Screen Share, Universal Guide, Web Browser
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Comprehensive Warranty on Product and 1 Year Additional warranty on Panel
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Defect Arising Out of Faulty, Defective Material or Workmanship are Covered in Warranty
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty does not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups and TV Picture Tubes, Panel, Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused due to Tampering of the Product by An Unauthorised Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience. The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked. Demonstration of features and settings Quick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.Crystal Display: This TV produces crystal-clear visuals with vivid and vibrant colours to ensure an immersive viewing experience.
product_description.Crystal Processor 4K: It features a single chip that adjusts the colors and the contrast ratio of the images to offer high-quality visuals on screen.

review: One of the best TV in the UHD 4K segment. Can enjoy Visuals in crystal clear display. Value for money.

This is a review after 2 days of use. TV was properly delivered in fair time even in this uncertain period and installation by a Samsung technician was done right next day of delivery. This is my second 55inch smart TV at my home and first Samsung. I explored almost all functionalities of the TV and I have reset the TV to factory settings once. Below are my findings.
Positive:
1. Price
2. Looks very beautiful. Almost frameless.
3. I had a major doubt when purchasing the TV about it's remote control. And yes, it's a smart remote and has voice control and hot keys. It's connected with Bluetooth and you can control TV from anywhere even if you don't have line of sight. Looks very elegant and is very easy to use.
4. Initial setting up of TV is very simple using Samsung Smart Things app in your phone. Though it's a bit complicated to use the app after setting up is done.
5. Best thing about this TV is that, TV remote automatically detects and syncs the functionalities of your set top box. That is, I use d2h and I don't need a remote separately to change channels or such, as TV remote is functional now with STB. This is an awesome feature.
6. As this is a Samsung TV there is no need to mention about picture quality.
7. While I was buying this TV I was also thinking about buying a 160W creative sound bar. But the TV has awesome sound output. You get decent bass also. Only if you are a hard core sound fan, you would require a sound bar. Else, sound is decent.

Negative
1. You need to go deep inside the rear side of TV to reach connectivity ports like USB port. I have barely 5cm left in the sides of TV and hence it's impossible to plug in and out a USBs. I have attached a male-female cable on TV permanently.
2. I don't know if this will be negative for many people, may be because of the high refresh rate, you don't get the feel of watching a movie, rather u feels like watching a serial. That is be it in DTH, USB or OTT, movies feels like serial or a usual video. Though there is no problem at all in this, I felt this a bit different as there is a typical look for pictures of movies, you don't get that here.

Summing up, this is the best TV you get at this price I am guessing. Looks, sound, remote and picture quality being the best things in this TV.
Good luck for your purchase.

Very nice TV. Excellent audio quality. Especially above1440p videos gives you best performance.

Keep in mind, there is no RCA output for tv audio(red and white). Only audio video input is available targeting dish, cable top box. Smart content audio output is only available as optical audio out put and hdmi earc, which later can convert to typical red and white(purchase separately) for older home theaters which do not support earc hdmi and optical audio.

Tv was delivered on time. Samsung guy came and installed within 2 hours of delivery. He didnt know much about smart features so it was a quick installation. He came with free wall mount stand. Polite guy.
Connectivity is good. it is easy to connect with WIFI and bluetooth devices. Hotspot on mobile will be enough even for playing 4K videos.
Picture quality is just superb. You will just love the way it shows minute details in every video. Upscaling could have been better.
Sound at 20W is not that loud but it is clear. Dialogues are not loud while playing movies.
Design of TV is great, and Remote is classy.
Very few apps are available in app store.
Tizen OS is superfast, TV takes 5 sec for on and off.
Overall value for money and a pocket friendly 4K smart TV. Much better than cheap chinese brands. Its Made in India Product.

No doubt about display and sound quality. Alexa and bixby voice assistants works good with remote except(Only Turn OFF works with voice). However all the settings in external apps Alexa, Samsung Smart things its recognize as Series 6 TV but even in samsung site its listed series 8.

Its bug or just the software version? Or samsung clears stock of series 6 UHD with extra cosmetic updates?. It will be good if Samsung clarifies this to increase the satisfaction level of customer and to avoid initial disappointment.

Wonderful product.
Samsung tv is best in every aspect.everything is perfect.delivery on time.installation is also on time.very very good experience with this tv.picture quality,sound quality superb.so many features at this price.loved it.anyone can buy it without any doubt or suspicion.why compromise cheap when this awesome product available in genuine price

A perfect budget TV! Worth buying it!
Thought of going to Vu or Nokia!
Samsung being premium at this price is unimaginable!!
Thanks to Flipkart for speedy delivery and Samsung Hosur guy Mr.Gokul did a good job in fitting and understanding the features of TV! Go for it without any second thought!

The packaging of the tv was good .The installation was done the very next day of delivery.The standard wall mount installation will be done free of cost .

The picture quality is good.The bluetooth connectivity is not bad. The sound quality I would say is decent.Its a 6 series tv. Ambience mode is only a fancy I didn't find it great.
The internal memory is very less close to 2gb.However prime,netflix, zee5 are pre installed.

I would say overall it's a value for money tv ..

I have purchased the product 0n 23 of the delivered in 5 days and installed next day....
Good picture quality
Good connectivity
Good sound
Good built of the product
And good positions of USB and HDMI ports.
And off course Samsung brand .
Good product in this amount.

Only one thing is not up to the mark is internal storage
Only 2 GB is available for storage of app... Which I think is not sufficient.

Happy to buy the product ....
Bought 55" TV with reasonable price, picture quality is super... Better to purchase samsung Or sony if you are expecting good picture quality rather than any Chinese products.
One of the best TV in the UHD 4K segment. Can enjoy Visuals in crystal clear display. Value for money.

Coming to UHD videos, today only I watched The Dark Knight on this TV, and I was amazed too see those small details in the movie which I never saw before ( I have watched this movie earlier on laptop and tablet). To be more precise, The suit of the Batman Was showing every minute detail, the explosion scene was looking so realistic and it goes on.

The speakers are decent with quality Bass and sound. You go ahead and listen to all ur EDM songs and feel the beat. Its quite enough for a normal person.

I received the product on the exact date given by flipkart. The next date samsung executives came for installation. He was in a tearing hurry and did not explain much of the functionalities. Now after having gone through each and every aspect myself, following is the verdict. It is a very nice TV. Picture quality is good for the price. However do not expect the best. Sound quality is average. Wifi connectivity is good. It also connects to the PC and laptop without hassles. However when I connected it to my sony speakers, the bluetooth connectivity was irregular. Overall a good TV at this price. However if you have experienced OLED and QLED tv viewing, picture quality would look average but compared to other normal LED tvs even FHD ones it is awesome.

1080p videos also gives stunning result.

Other Android TVs are able to Connect to wifi router via network provider's log in page but in TIZEN OS i cant go to login page of wifi network provider.

Voice search is ridiculous, very bad.
Picture Ambient mode is not as expected. You have to upload your photos to Samsung cloud for this feature.

This TV is very good in this range. I am using this TV for last 3 to 4 months but I haven't face any problem. There are some minor issues. The image quality of this tv is really good. And sound quality is decent low but good. This is a 4k TV. There are some of the features that I like the most i.e. Remote PC, Office 365, Screen mirroring and many mores. There are many apps available in this TV as example like you to Netflix, Prime video, Hotstar, sonyliv, Samsung internet, Samsung gallery, YouTube, alt Balaji, Aaj Tak, and many more app are available in this TV. SCREEN MIRRORING
You can connect the PC screen on the Samsung TV by using this feature.
SAMSUNG DEX
By using this feature you can view the screen of your mobile.

Writting this review after 1 month of usage of the 43 inch model.

Firstly the TV was delivered exactly on the schedule date and time. The installation was also done on the given date but due to Sunday the tv was installed on Monday.
The Table top stand was included in the box. Wall mount kit was brought by the installation person.

Coming to the TV,

PROS.

The display quality is very good . Sharpness and colour are on point as it's a samsung display.

The display is edge to edge but there is a short black border on its all sides.

The design feels very premium. Very impressed with design.

The remote is bluetooth enabled. The response time is quick enough.

The best thing is that TV doesn't take too much time to boot up.

The cable connection or Set Top Box works very nicely.
I have to upgrade to hd plan for a better viewing quality.

The OS is also good and responsive.

Works fine with a decent bluetooth earphone or headset.
Headphone jack is missing so you have to buy a dongle or a blue sound system.

Wifi Connectivity is also decent.

The processor is also good enough considering the price of this tv at 40k. Streams a 4k video properly on YouTube if the wifi connection is good.

Screen mirroring works very much smooth.

CONS.

The display is good and sharper but sometimes the brightness feels a bit low.

It's my first samsung smart tv so I was having not much of idea about the OS. The OS is good but also disappointing a lot. At time of buying I was checking specs and found out that the storage was not mentioned at all and here comes the issue that you can't install any third party apps in this TV. The apps which are available in its store only that are accessible.

The apps on the store are very much limited means sometimes I can literally remember 70% of the apps.

If you are playing any video via pendrive or harddrive there is only one default video player which I personally didn't like. You can't change the language of the movie. There are very limited video player setting.

If you use OTT apps then there is no option for downloading or saving offline.

Now starts the most disappointing things of this TV.
Firstly if you are a sound lover, just skip this tv series, go for samsung frame or serif series or connect a sound system. If you are streaming a video or movie the vocals are not heard properly I was seating 5-6 feets close then to at 70% volume I found it difficult to hear and the base goes suddenly too much high you have to constantly increase and decrease the volume. I suggest you to go with a sound bar. Very disappointed with sound.

The second disappointment was the OS setting, there are a number of features given in settings but hardly 40-50% of them are accessible. If we can't use it then why have the company given it

CONCLUSION.
For a normal user this TV is more than enough. If talking about speaker it's only good for a 10 by 10 room, for a bigger room you need sound system. And for the installing third party apps just buy a firestick or best is MI box 4k.

For first time TV buyers I recommend this TV, only to those who want 43 inch at price if 35-40k.

If you want to buy 50 inch or 55 inch which are cost 45k to 50k, then I would recommend you to go for OnePlus tv which cost 50k for 55 inch.

Don't go for the 65inch variant of this tv, instead add a few money in it and go for the frame series or the serif series or QLED series which are from samsung. They are a much better deal and you will be totally satisfied with it.
Thank me latter..

DELIVERY
TV is very good. Delivery was on time. Samsung representative also installed it on time. I use it for my computer. I dont use the built-in assistant or the apps. Here is my assessment of the TV.
TV
Visuals are good. The brightness is also decent. Screen size is good. But the glass top is not anti glare. It is reflective, makes watching the screen at day time a bit strenuous. Bezels are disappointing. Even though the website says 3 side thin bezels, that is not the case. They are actually inside and behind the glass front. It looks thin only when the TV is off.
DISPLAY
HDR is supported. But this also decreases the brightness suddenly and significantly. A manual tuning is required and it is a task to do. A direct ALL SETTINGS button on the remote would be appreciated in this case. Sharpness is a bit of disappointment as you need to set it at least two third way up for it to actually make visual impact.
CONNECTIVITY
There are really good connectivity options. 2 HDMI + 1 HDMI with eARC (audio return channel). Composite, optical out, Bluetooth for speakers, wifi fot internet and screen mirror, ethernet port. 2 USB 2.0, and RF. More USB ports would be appreciated for those who use LED lights behind their screen for powering them.
FEATURES
It has tons of features like adaptive sound, ambience mode, game mode, and also provides storage. The Ambience Mode is superb as the TV can be used as a photo frame to display all of your favourite pics. Also the Music mode is really useful when you are cleaning your house or room or just having a party with friends you need not invest in a music player, as the TV really gives great options for tuning.
DESIGN
The design is beautiful. It looks sleek. It has enough space under the TV for set top boxes or a decent size sound bar even when you use the stands provided instead of mounting it. However the engineering on the TV is not flawless. It gets overheated soon. Touch the back of the TV on the top side after an hour or two. The power and connection ports are far apart making cable management a bit hard.
REMOTE
Remote is good but the assistant can only be used through the remote. There is no dedicated ALL SETTINGS button which means you always need to navigate to the settings for tuning the display. Atleast a quick button on the remote for picture and sound expert settings would be useful.
POWER SAVINGS
Power saving wise it is not that great. There is an Eco mode but it is not that great. There are no fine tuning options and you have to rely on the preset options. Wifi is always on, cannot be shut down. All the Eco Mode does is adjust the brightness settings. There is no fast display off if no signal input. All of them are set above 2 hours.
EXPECTATIONS FROM SAMSUNG
Since this is a smart TV, most of the above cons can be solved with a simple firmware update. However, the bezels, the top glass screen, the smart remote, the heating issues need to be re engineered for future customers with better design and engineering. Doing this will most definitely make it a top contender in its segment.

I'm writing this review after using the product for 2 weeks.
Got the product as per the scheduled date and the installation of the same was provided the very next day. Based on my usage, I found the product really good with the following Pros and Cons.

Pros:
1. Display is very good and definitely better than Mi TV, VU, Real me etc. I believe display is the important feature of a TV and it will not disappoint in this aspect.
2. Connectivity is fast, no issues whatsoever.
3. Sound is enough for a TV, its loud and clear.
4. Has popular OTT apps pre installed.
5. Screen casing works pretty well with minimal lagging.
6. Screen on and off is faster than other TV's like Mi TV, VU, Real me etc.
7. UI is simple.

Cons:
1. Tizen is good, but Android would have been better.
2. Sometimes there is a lag in TV remote response. Not always.

Opinion: As I believe that display is the prominent feature of a TV, the product has a great display quality and hence it is a great buy.
